font.strong: We move your business processes to the digital platform.

div.p: We work to make your company efficient, profitable and visible.

p.font: We use the world's most respected new generation software that will provide end-to-end solutions for all your business's digital needs and allow us to set up a system. We get their partnerships and provide consultancy, installation and development services.

p.font: We improve and develop your operations, reduce your costs, and provide instant information for a proactive management strategy.

p.font: ERP, CMS, E-TransformationWe provide the greatest support for your company to reach its full potential, with the systems we designed to combine all your resources and use them efficiently.

span.font: Shorten the time it takes to resolve problems and avoid repetitive costs and waste of time.

div.p: Adapt these three columns to fit your design need. To duplicate, delete or move columns, select the column and use the top icons to perform your action.

with clicks. The Digital Transformation process also
. Moreover, this optimization is not one-off, but

p.font: We see even the smallest work we do for your company as the first steps of a digital transformation process. We aim to be your solution partner in such a process.
We complete our work perfectly, we stick to the times we gave at the beginning, and thus we know that you will call us again for your evolving needs over time.
We see your needs and problems, as well as our own needs and problems, as the first step in providing a solution, to understand deeply and accurately.

strong.font: Being known for the quality of the service we provide is the main source of pride for us, Codequarters team.

p.span: For more than 30 years, it has been producing Atmospheric Air Filters and Compressor Air Systems, based in Ankara, with over 500 employees.

p.span: Engie, a global energy company with over 150,000 employees, has been operating in Turkey for 40 years.​

div.class: s_col_no_bgcolor pb16 col-lg-3 pt16 o_animate o_animate_on_scroll o_anim_zoom_in

p.span: Aydın Örme has been operating in the fields of polyester yarn, home textile production and marketing and retailing for 28 years with an indoor area of 80.000 m² with over 500 employees.
